website_summaries.verdict: A flowery take on the Happy fragrance, with notes of freesias and mimosas.
pros: The undertones of wood and amber stop this fruity, floral scent from being too sweet or sickly
cons: It's not as long-lasting as some of the other Clinique products

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting, beautiful scent!
customer_reviews.text: This perfume is amazing! I received it as a gift in 2010 and fell in love with it but never repurchased. I recently decided to give it a try again and it is so wonderful. The scent is flowery and warm. Supposedly it is meant to be a Spring scent but I intend to wear it year-round. My favorite thing about it is that it lasts all day. It’s pretty remarkable. And just one spray is enough. A lot of perfumes smell great when first applied but minutes later, it’s like you never put it on. This scent truly lasts. So pleased with it!
customer_reviews.author: Margaret Brown

customer_reviews.title: This is no good!!
customer_reviews.text: This is not authentic. I wear this fragrance all the time, and this bottle doesn’t smell right nor look right. The liquid looks yellow, and authentic is a light pink/lavender. This is no good!!! Does not smell like it should.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela B

customer_reviews.title: 100% Perfect!!!
customer_reviews.text: I highly recommend this seller, this is the first time on Amazon that I have bought a Happy product and recieved the actual product in perfect condition and well taken care of! I have been a Happy wearer for 10 years, and when I order through Amazon I usually receive a bottle of ‘turned’ perfume and overall terrible product. This is their Seasonal scent, I have a rollerball from Clinique, and this seller sent my bottle in perfect condition and scent is strong and perfect. Highly recommended!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kate Smith

customer_reviews.title: Decently priced 😉
customer_reviews.text: I love this fragrance, it is my personal favorite. It is priced better here than in stores. It has a very pleasant not overwhelming scent.
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: Like Clinique Happy, but floral
customer_reviews.text: I love Clinique Happy, the original. I wear it everyday. I don't like Happy Heart, to me it has something in the smell that is too harsh and artificial, it smells cheap. Happy in Bloom is like the original, but better. Not too sweet, but it's floral and fresh with the same undertones as the original. Happy in Bloom is my absolute all time favourite perfume. I bought it first in 1995 when it was limited edition, and I'm so glad that they made it again and I found it again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sent didn’t last like the one I tried in the store :(
customer_reviews.text: I tried this perfume in the store in the scent was amazing it lasted all night with one spray and I couldn’t stop smelling it and how good it was so I ordered it and it seems like the scent isn’t there I spray and spray and spray and I never smell it I’m kind of sad because I really do love this
customer_reviews.author: kim v.

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price
customer_reviews.text: I love this perfume. Light. Floral. Everyday. I've bought the smaller bottle a few times, but when I saw the larger bottle on sale I jumped in it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect year round everyday scent
customer_reviews.text: I’d been a devoted user of Clinique happy heart for years but I was ready to try something new. This scent still has a reminiscence of the happy heart but with a more floral sweet note. Just lovely! Good price on amazon too.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck

customer_reviews.title: Favorite perfume!
customer_reviews.text: I love this perfume. It is my favorite. I always get compliments on it! It lasts forever, even after washing my shirts when I’m hanging them up I can smell this perfume faintly still!
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey Juelfs

customer_reviews.title: Clinique happy
customer_reviews.text: My favorite Clinique fragrance and very hard to find. Love the scent
customer_reviews.author: Lorraine

customer_reviews.title: Another Clinique must have.
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect spring scent. Floral and last all day. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: MENDY V

customer_reviews.title: Delicate scent.
customer_reviews.text: Love this scent. I get migraines from strong perfumes and this one is delicate and a wonderful scent.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Harvey

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t smell right
customer_reviews.text: Pretty sure this is not real Doesn’t smell like the bottle I bought at the mall
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My favorite
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this for years and have more compliments than any other fragrance I’ve ever used
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 🤷
customer_reviews.text: SMELLS AWESOME...let's see how long it lasts... Then I'll write ANOTHER review
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My favorite
customer_reviews.text: Amazing smelling but a bit overpriced considering the bottle is small...
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Halpin

customer_reviews.title: I didn’t get what I paid for!
customer_reviews.text: I was trying to return the item due to it had no smell at all. I was very disappointed that I got nothing for the money I spent.
customer_reviews.author: wayne walston

customer_reviews.title: This is exactly what I wanted!
customer_reviews.text: Shipped on time and is just perfect! Belk wont even get this in stock until late March!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Arrived quickly, packaged well!
customer_reviews.text: Love this perfume! Arrived in a timely manner, packaged well. Will purchase again. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Thank you!!
customer_reviews.text: Thank you for the speedy delivery It's exactly what I wanted!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not the Real Thing
customer_reviews.text: I am a lifelong Clinique client and have purchased 'Happy in Bloom' many times, I love the fragrance. When it was discontinued and my local store closed I was heartbroken and turned to Amazon to see if I could find anyone selling the fragrance. When I found this I was excited ... until it arrived :( The bottle is not the same and the smell is horrible. This is NOT the original Happy in Bloom by Clinique. Do Not be Fooled!
customer_reviews.author: Dawn  Maiella

customer_reviews.title: A new Clinique favorite!
customer_reviews.text: I usually wear Happy Heart by Clinique, but wanted to try another scent. This is similar, but smells just a great (light, flowery) and lasts all day with just a few squirts. I was also concerned that it wasn't genuine, but it definitely is! I've gotten many compliments in just a few days of wearing it.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Balser

customer_reviews.title: Real brand! Great price
customer_reviews.text: Always my favorite perfume. Definitely the real deal. Best deal you'll find on this particular scent many clinique happy varieties but this one blooming flowers hard to find especially for this price. All the perfume sites have it listed for 10 dollars more if not double the price. It was a long shipping time like few weeks but well worth it
customer_reviews.author: Elaina

customer_reviews.title: Great fragrance
customer_reviews.text: The product arrived in a timely manner and the price was certainly a bonus. Have purchased this elsewhere and the cost was substantially more. Hope I can continue to obtain Happy in Bloom at Amazon in the future.
customer_reviews.author: PSMaschino

customer_reviews.title: Happy
customer_reviews.text: I smelled this on a women and asked her what she was wearing and had to order it. Amazon had it at a good price and it arrived fast. I am Happy In Bloom!!!
customer_reviews.author: Ruthie

customer_reviews.title: Favorite!
customer_reviews.text: Its gotten hard to find this cologne since its discontinued. Grateful to have found it!
customer_reviews.author: Auburnmom

customer_reviews.title: Fresh Scent
customer_reviews.text: This is the nicest scent and I get lots of compliments when I wear it.
customer_reviews.author: PAT - Austin, Texas

customer_reviews.title: Flowery delight!
customer_reviews.text: Smells amazing!!! A nice size for the price! Love Happy perfume!
customer_reviews.author: kasey troutman

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: It’s good perfume. It’s real Clinique and it’s not old. Smells fresh.
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: Would order again
customer_reviews.text: Ordered 9/4 and got it 9/15 but I was aware of the longer shipping time. Exactly what I wanted. Perfect sized packaging. No damages.
customer_reviews.author: Esther Lee

customer_reviews.title: Authentic
customer_reviews.text: Perfect. True authentic product. Package and shipped with care. Will reorder.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda

customer_reviews.title: Light and lovely fragrance
customer_reviews.text: Love this scent, can only find once a year...so it's a treat...
customer_reviews.author: KTLoyd

customer_reviews.title: Smells great
customer_reviews.text: I love this fragrance and sometimes I run out before they put it out there for sale.
customer_reviews.author: Marti

customer_reviews.title: In Bloom is a great spring and summer scent
customer_reviews.text: In Bloom is a great spring and summer scent. Light and floral. I get a lot of compliments on it!
customer_reviews.author: Atlanta Girl
